page.title: 06 THE HARVEY BROTHERS
page.content: The Harvey brothers were born at Blake Farm and have lived there all their lives. They now run the farm together. They each have a house of their own. Mr Clive Harvey's house is 500 years old and is timber framed. Mr John Harvey's house is quite new. Clive's hobby is flying. He owns Andrews Airfield and has two planes there. He is also renovating a plane that was used in the second world war. He found it in Italy where it had been used by the Italian Airforce. It is a Harvard plane and it was used for bombing. He hopes evetually that it will fly. John's hobby is shooting. The brothers have 50 acres of woodland and they grow special crops to encourage wildlife. Between November and January they organise Shoots where people can come and shoot pheasants.
